metadata.creator: MIKA
metadata.title: MIKA - Popular Song ft. Ariana Grande

tracks.text: In a kitchen, Mika and Ariana Grande stare at us intently. Mika has short, wavy brown hair, and wears a white shirt with a blue vest. Grande has medium length wavy black hair, pinned in a ponytail. She wears a black shirt and a checkered apron. Mika stirs a cauldron while Grande pours blue liquid into it. Bubbles float out of the bubbling, black concoction.
In a classroom, Grande stares at a blond girl sitting at the desk next to her.
Mika pulls out a blackberry and types Ichabod and 2 more. Next to him, a blackboard spells out Arsenic Acid, and a hazard warning symbol.
Ichabod, a student in black and white stripes, looks at his phone. Dinner party at 11. He smiles and pumps his fist at Mika, who shows a fist back.
In a high school hallway, students wearing black and white walk, holding books.
Ichabod jumps off a railing and slaps Mika's books out of his hand. He walks away laughing while Mika stares at him.
Grande stares as the blonde girl reads a message on her phone. She turns to Grande and smiles. Grande stares, unmovingly
Mika smiles menacingly as the cauldron bubbles.
Grande pours a green liquid into the cauldron.
Grande drops a dead rat into the cauldron. She shrugs and smiles sweetly.
Mika sings to us
In a hallway, Grande talks to a boy in front of coffin shaped lockers.
The blonde girl approaches and pushes Grande aside, smiling at the boy.
In the classroom, Grande stares intently and the blonde girl, while Mika watches over her shoulder.
The blonde girl turns and smiles. Grande smiles sweetly back. Mika smiles widely over her shoulder.
In the kitchen, Grande and Mika sing over the cauldron.
A curly haired boy pulls Mika into a bathroom stall. Grande throws leaves into the cauldron.
The curly haired boy pushes Mika into a toilet while laughing
Mika sings over the cauldron as Grande adds green liquids.
They sing as bubbles float past their smiling faces.
In the classroom, the curly haired boy looks at his phone, smiles, and looks at Mika, who returns the smile. Grande turns to Mika, who nods.
Someone hits a car key fob. Mika stands next to a blue car with a front plate reading Popular. The car talks.
Mika sings and drives.
Grande stares out the passenger window and sings.
They sing in the kitchen.
Grande throws something in the cauldron.
Mika's watch shows 11:00
Grande gestures welcomingly to a black dining table surrounded by red, lit candles.
Mika sits at the left, Grande to the right. The 3 guests sit in the center.
The curly haired boy, in a black and white pinstripe suit, toasts.
Ichabod and the blonde girl drink from their goblets.
Grande sings. Mika plays with cutlery.
Ichabod looks up, wearing a worried expression.
He turns to stone.
The curly haired man drops his food and stands up. He turns to stone mid stand.
Mika lifts a candlestick and strikes Ichabod, who shatters into dust.
Grande smacks the curly haired stone man with a serving plate. He shatters.
The blonde girl grabs her chest, falls sideways, turns into stone on the way down, and shatters as she hits the floor.
Mika and Grande look at each other across the table.
They place their smashing instruments on the table.
They pick up goblets and walk towards each other.
They toast. Mika drinks while Grande watches intently.
Mika looks worried, then looks at his goblet.
A young girl makes a tower with blocks. A young boy comes up and kicks the blocks. The girl crosses her arms.
Grande glares at Mika, who turns to stone.
Grande sings to us. Aperture to black.
